sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access/>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.ScrumAjaxDragCheckerRelease</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>ScrumAjaxDragCheckerRelease</description>
        <name>ScrumAjaxDragCheckerRelease</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ScrumAjaxDragCheckerRelease = Class.create();
ScrumAjaxDragCheckerRelease.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxListDragChecker, {
   isDragEnabledForItem: function(record){
      if (!this.hasPermission(record))
         return false;    
      else if (record.sprint && record.sprint != null && record.sprint != "")
         return false;
      else
         return true;
   },

   hasPermission: function(record){
      return ScrumSecurityManager.canWriteStoryDotRelease(record);
   },

   getDisabledMessageForItem: function(record){
      if (!this.hasPermission(record))
         return gs.getMessage("Cannot move because you do not have permission");
      else if (record.sprint && record.sprint != null && record.sprint != "")
         return gs.getMessage("Cannot move because this Story is assigned to a Sprint");
      else
         return "";
   },

   getTableName: function(){
      return "rm_story";
   }
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2011-08-11 13:36:17</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>762a8e2b37101000dadaa3549dbe5d41</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ScrumAjaxDragCheckerRelease</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Agile Development" source="com.snc.sdlc.scrum.pp">4e159f242fc10110d8a4d5f62799b627</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_762a8e2b37101000dadaa3549dbe5d41</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2011-10-04 11:08:15</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>964</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
